name: Stéphane Demri
content: Laboratoire Spécification et Vérification Stéphane Demri Senior researcher, CNRS Publications on HAL Recent talks Lecture notes Course "Logical Aspects of AI" (2023 -- 2024). See the page of the course here. Course "Initiation to research -- Scientific watch: uncertainty/temporal reasoning in AI" (2023--2024). See the page of the course here. Proud member of the group Theory of structured data in the LIA SINFIN. GDR RADIA: Raisonnement, Apprentissage, et Décision en Intelligence Artificielle How to submit an article to Fundamenta Informaticae How to submit an article to Bulletin of the Section of Logic Second Workshop on Automated Deduction for Separation Logics (ADSL 2020) New Orleans, Louisiana, USA, January 20th, 2020. 34th AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI-20) New York, NY, USA, February 7-12, 2020.
